definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: As I see it, we can't even afford to have him arrested or accused.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，要是他被捕或受到起訴，那咱就受不了。

sentences.english: The visa reciprocity, to me, is a real issue.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，簽證互惠是一個真正的問題。

sentences.english: Seems to me the desire here is a semi stealthly fighter bomber that is affordable.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來這是架廉價的半隱形戰鬥轟炸機。

sentences.english: He was somewhere between a second father and an older brother to me.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，他扮演着一個介於父親和兄長之間的角色。

sentences.english: As far as I can see the whole matter is open-and-shut.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，整件事情是一目瞭然的。

sentences.english: For me, where are the evidences?
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，一切都需要拿出證據。

sentences.english: The important thing to notice here, it seems to me, is the conflict between pulling and pushing.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須注意的事情，在我看來，是推拉之間的矛盾。

sentences.english: The most threatening change, from my perspective, is extermination of species.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，威脅最大的莫過於物種的滅絕。

sentences.english: Don't worry about it. It seems to me that you always do better than you say.
sentences.chinese: 彆着急，在我看來每次你的考試結果都比你說的要好。

sentences.english: and I gotta admit it sounds right to me.
sentences.chinese: 我得承認在我看來是對的。

sentences.english: In my opinion. I think that make no sense.
sentences.chinese: 但是在我看來卻是非常沒有意義的。

sentences.english: The way I see it is Japan has finally had its post–World War II political upheaval.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，日本終於要面對二戰之後的政治大變局了。

sentences.english: To me his new book doesn't appear to be as interesting as his others .
sentences.chinese: 在我看來他的新著沒有他的其他作品引人入勝。

sentences.english: In my opinion, we must take a correct attitude to it.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，我們必須採取正確的態度去面對都市生活。

sentences.english: I think Hua Mulan is a woman.
sentences.chinese: 但在我看來花木蘭只是一位女性。

sentences.english: I would argue traditional development is undisciplined.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，傳統的開發纔是訓練不足的。
